name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Superchat - AI Powered note taking for free

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take Notes faster, sync with Notion right on the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amplify your browser note taking, Superchat is the most efficient FREE note taking application for the browser. 


Key Features: 
1. Summarize, translate and paraphrase anything on the web, and store it right in the notes.
2. Drag and drop any images directly to the notes.
3. Hit a writer block, use our free AI to continue your thought and even brainstorm new ideas.
4. Create To-do lists and actions.

Beta Features:

1. Integrate these notes with your Notion document. You can clip any content from the web, and it will be directly saved to your Notion doc without disrupting your Notion doc structure. 


What makes us the best ChatGPT extension out there?

We are:

üîê Super Friendly - 100% privacy-friendly

üëç Super Accessible - Easily accessible from any tab with just one click.  


Q: What is SuperChat.fyi? ‚ö°
A: It is a browser note taking tool powered by ChatGPT. Take notes for free, seamlessly right on the web.

Q: How does it work? ‚ö°
A: Just download the extension, sign-up with Google, and jot down the notes.

Q: Can I use this extension for commercial purposes? ‚ö°
A: Yes, it can be used for commercial purposes. 

Q: Is it free to use? ‚ö°
A: Yes, it is absolutely free-to-use! 

Q: Can I share my feedback and suggestions with the team? ‚ö°
Hey there! This is Shivam. we really want to make this tool the best it can be for you. So, if you have any feedback about our tool, or are even just interested in learning more about it, shoot me an email at Shivam@superchat.fyi or join our Discord channel at *insert your profile*. We'd totally love to hear from you! Drop us a line anytime. :)

A: We strongly believe in continuous improvement and refining our product to meet your needs and so we highly encourage our valued users to share their feedback and insightful comments with us, so we can make our tool even better and more efficient. If you have any feedback, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us at Shivam@superchat.fyi.  

Q: Does it support multiple languages? ‚ö°
A: We provide comprehensive support for multiple languages for it. However, if you feel like we are missing your preferred language, shoot an email to Shivam@superchat.fyi. 

Q: Is it secure and privacy-compliant? ‚ö°
A: We take security and privacy seriously and follows industry standards to protect user data.

Q: What happens if I encounter a problem while using the extension? ‚ö°

Hey there! This is Shivam. We really want to ensure that you have a seamless experience with our tool. So, if you face any issues while using the tool, shoot me an email at Shivam@superchat.fyi or send us a message on our Discord https://discord.gg/2tw63Q4C
